name: Hare Runner
description:
THE YEAR IS TWENTY-EIGHTY-TWELVE... teen...?

And vegetables have moved from enemies of toddlers to enemy of bunny-kind.  🐰

Harvest or be harvested!  Enter the cyberpunk dystopia to harvest sentient crops to fuel your cybernetic body before the farmer's combine slices you to bits. 🥕

Survive waves of enemies to encounter the final boss: CORN! 🌽

Post your best run! 🔢
